stories.text: Most brands are worth more than the value of the thing they sell, hence the high profit margins. Is it possible the same kind of phenomenon is happening with bitcoin?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is it possible the “extra value” in Bitcoin is brand equity?

stories.text: Please join us for talks on the Metaverse by Matthew Ball; 'Disrupt disruption' by Pascal Finette, Data flows and data monetization by Wendy Li, a conversation between VC Jeff Herbst from GFT Ventures (formerly at NVIDIA) and Eliot Brown from the Wall Street Journal and much more! Free and open to the public by requested invitation: https://www.orangesv.com/blog/the-hello-show-returns-for-2021-discuss-and-learn-about-new-technologies-disrupting-and-bringing-value-to-companies-and-ecosystems/
stories.title: Free innovation summit: the Hello Show by Orange Silicon Valley, Oct. 5-7
